posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob Bannon
Hi,

This is the 2nd round of trying to buy t206 beaters. My Sister and I are trying to finish (or nearly finish) a collection of these cards started by an old man about 60 years ago. Any condition and any back is fine. Below are the cards we still need.

Thanks, Bob

1909-1911 T206 Needs: Any condition. 

22 Bastian, 
32 Bender-pitching no trees,
33 Bender-pitching with trees, 
36 Bergen-catching, 
38 Bernhard,

Posted By: Jeff Schwarz
I've got the Breitenstein, Evans, and Poland!

Jason
